Articles.Content:
Just thought I'd share the little stock ion lander I've been playing with recently...

 

Craft file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/jla63o1cyg13jqp/Duna%20ion%20lander%209.craft?dl=0

There's some clipping with the fuel arrays because otherwise they are so fugly. 

It lands fine. Just deploy the airbrakes before de-orbit from 60km with a Pe of around 20km. Then deploy the 'chutes at about 200m/s. 

Takeoff is slightly restricted by the not-huge TWR, so best to fly vertically to 5km and then take a 60° turn to a 60km orbit. Should have around 600m/s left by orbit, enough for a rendezvous.  

Edited March 26, 2016 by Foxster
